attributes.action: Postpone Brexit deadline till the global Pandemic crisis has been resolved.
attributes.background: The U.K. government has said that regardless of outcomes Britain will leave the EU in December. I request that the U.K. departure be delayed firstly so that all energy focuses on dealing with the pandemic and 2ndly for an assessment to be made of the wisdom of departure under a changing world.

rejection.details:
